title: Emerald and Pearl Cascading Haaram - A Timeless Classic
materials: brilliant-cut Diamonds (4.91 carats). Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite haaram features a gracefully cascading design. It is set with vibrant, step-cut Emeralds interspersed with delicate floral motifs crafted from sparkling Diamonds. Strings of shimmering diamonds lead to lustrous South Sea Pearls creating a captivating pendant effect. The piece is strung together on a delicate rose gold chain.
occasions: or any grand celebration where you want to make a statement. Its modern design also makes it suitable for upscale events and cocktail parties.
description: This haaram beautifully blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary design. The high-quality Emeralds and South Sea Pearls exude luxury and sophistication. It is a statement piece that will be cherished for generations. The rose gold adds warmth and complements various skin tones. The cascading design creates a flattering and elegant silhouette.
